title: Hall of Forgotten Toys Adventure #107
goal: Solve the puzzles, achieve the main objective, and escape.

rooms.name: Dusty Playroom
rooms.description: A dimly lit playroom filled with forgotten toys covered in dust and cobwebs. Moonlight filters through a cracked window, casting eerie shadows on the walls. A rocking horse sits motionless in the corner, and shelves overflow with abandoned playthings. The air smells of old wood and faded memories.

items.name: old toy chest
items.description: A large wooden chest painted with faded circus animals. Three drawers are built into its side.

items.name: faded letter
items.description: A yellowed letter written in childish handwriting
items.text: Dear Future Me, I buried my favorite toys here in 1955, the year I turned 10. Remember: Mr Buttons was my first toy, the Jack in the Box scared me at night, and the Music Box played my favorite lullaby. Love, Little Emma

items.name: brass windup key
items.description: A small brass key used for winding up mechanical toys

items.name: Victorian dollhouse
items.description: An elaborate dollhouse with tiny furniture and porcelain dolls inside

items.name: tiny silver locket
items.description: A delicate locket small enough to fit a doll, but it opens to reveal a real keyhole

items.name: wooden rocking horse
items.description: A weathered rocking horse with a hollow compartment in its base

items.name: toy diary
items.description: A small diary with entries about favorite toys
items.text: Emma's Toy Diary: My three most special toys are Mr Buttons the teddy bear who sits on the shelf, my Jack in the Box who lives in the music room, and my precious Music Box that plays Twinkle Twinkle Little Star.

items.name: playroom door
items.description: A wooden door leading to the music room, slightly ajar

rooms.name: Toy Music Room
rooms.description: A room filled with musical toys and instruments. A large mechanical music box dominates the center of the room. Toy drums, xylophones, and tiny pianos line the walls. Dusty sheet music is scattered across the floor. The atmosphere feels frozen in time, waiting for someone to bring the music back to life.

items.name: Mr Buttons the teddy bear
items.description: A worn teddy bear with button eyes sitting on a high shelf

items.name: ornate music box key
items.description: A decorative key designed to unlock music boxes

items.name: Jack in the Box
items.description: A colorful box with a crank handle. A creepy clown face peers from inside.
items.text: A tag on the bottom reads: 'Jack knows the secret! The Gallery holds the way out. Count the toys: bears, dolls, and trains!'

items.name: scattered sheet music
items.description: Old sheet music for various children's songs
items.text: The top sheet shows 'Twinkle Twinkle Little Star' with a note: 'Emma's favorite song. The music box in the gallery plays this tune.'

items.name: large mechanical music box
items.description: An ornate music box with intricate gears and a winding mechanism. It needs a key to unlock.

items.name: hidden note
items.description: A note hidden inside the music box
items.text: To open the Gallery Door: You must know which toys were most loved. Answer with their names in the order they were cherished.

items.name: toy piano
items.description: A small wooden piano with dusty keys

items.name: gallery entrance door
items.description: An elegant door with three questions carved into a brass plate

password_questions.question: What was Emma's first toy?
password_questions.hint: Check the childhood letter in the playroom

password_questions.question: What toy scared Emma at night?
password_questions.hint: The letter mentions which toy was frightening

password_questions.question: What toy played Emma's favorite song?
password_questions.hint: The diary and sheet music reveal this

rooms.name: Gallery of Remembered Toys
rooms.description: You have entered the heart of the Hall of Forgotten Toys! A magnificent gallery where the most beloved toys are displayed in glass cases, each glowing with a soft, warm light. The walls are lined with photographs of children playing, laughing, and growing up. In the center, a grand archway shimmers with golden light, leading to freedom. The toys here are not forgotten at all, but cherished forever in memory.

items.name: illuminated display cases
items.description: Beautiful glass cases containing the most treasured toys, each with a small plaque

items.name: wall of memories
items.description: A wall covered in photographs showing happy moments of childhood
items.text: The photographs show Emma growing up with her toys, from age 5 to 15. The final photo shows her as an adult, smiling, with the caption: 'Toys are never truly forgotten. They live forever in our hearts.'

items.name: golden archway of memories
items.description: A shimmering archway that leads back to the real world, glowing with the warmth of cherished memories

rooms.win_message: You have reached the Gallery of Remembered Toys and discovered the truth: these toys were never truly forgotten. They live on in the memories and hearts of those who loved them. As you step through the golden archway, you carry with you the reminder that childhood joy never truly fades. You win!
